3.name: Narration
3.text:
After respectfully burying the remains of the
Golden Dragon, the female adventurer headed
towards the towering mountains near the village,
carrying an egg.

4.name: Narration
4.text:
The female adventurer had the villagers transport
necessary materials and food, and made
preparations to hatch the dragon egg.

5.name: Narration
5.text:
In the meantime, she continued to search through
various documents and supplemented the lacking
knowledge about dragon hatching.

7.name: Eni-sensei
7.text:
"It is said that the Golden Dragon prefers to make
its nest in places with clear air, such as high
mountains, ruins, and behind waterfalls... This
location should be more than adequate."

8.name: Eni-sensei
8.text:
"However, I have heard from experts that the
Golden Dragon warms its eggs by throwing them into
fire or lava..."

9.name: Eni-sensei
9.text:
"I mean... the artwork is pretty terrible, isn't
it?"

10.name: Eni-sensei
10.text:
"It's not wrong, but it kind of gives off a vibe
like we're cooking the egg, which even makes me
feel a strange sense of guilt."

11.name: Eni-sensei
11.text:
"The egg itself seems to be progressing smoothly
with this, so it seems like it will hatch soon.
Let's pray for a safe hatching..."

18.name: Eni-sensei
18.text:
"Thank goodness... It seems to be a healthy
child."

19.name: Eni-sensei
19.text:
"I heard that if a dragon egg is taken from its
nest and raised by someone other than a dragon,
the chances of it hatching safely are low. I was
really worried about it, but it looks like it was
needless after all."

21.name: Eni-sensei
21.text:
"As for the name... I see. In the language of
dragons, it's 'Sol Reguiania'. The immortal sun."

22.name: Eni-sensei
22.text:
"In our language, it's 'Sol'. Let's name her
that."

23.name: Eni-sensei
23.text:
"Nice to meet you, Kin Hinryuu (Gold Dragon
Wyrmling) Sol. I am your teacher."

29.name: Sol
29.text:
"Sensei! Just as you instructed, I went hunting
and caught a deer!"

30.name: Eni-sensei
30.text:
"Excellent. Sol, it seems you were able to do it
on your own."

31.name: Sol
31.text:
"I can do this much! I'm already a full-fledged...
or should I say, a full-dragon!"

32.name: Eni-sensei
32.text:
"Good grief. If you ask me, you're still just a
fledgling. ...Although I do feel like some parts
of your body have grown quite nicely. It's
impudent to be getting close to my size already."

34.name: Eni-sensei
34.text:
"No, it's nothing. First, let's have a meal. Let's
give thanks to the deer you hunted and partake."

38.name: Eni-sensei
38.text:
"As always, this child eats an incredible amount.
It reminds me that she's a dragon."

39.name: Eni-sensei
39.text:
"Well... leaving that aside... Sol. If you claim
to be a full-fledged individual, it's about time
you prove it on your own."

41.name: Eni-sensei
41.text:
"Yes, this is the graduation exam you've been
wishing for... the day you leave the nest. If you
achieve this, you will be a full-fledged
individual. You will stand alone as a splendid
dragon."

43.name: Eni-sensei
43.text:
"For the past two years, I've drilled you in all
the necessary areas. Arithmetic, knowledge of
human society, military studies, geography,
monster studies, and herbal medicine..."

44.name: Eni-sensei
44.text:
"Well, I don't have an aptitude for magic, so I
could only teach you the basics of magic and
miracles. I do regret that."

45.name: Sol
45.text: "It was really fun but also tough!!"

46.name: Eni-sensei
46.text:
"As expected of a golden dragon, you have a good
memory and are an excellent student. I was able to
have a very easy time."

47.name: Eni-sensei
47.text:
"My previous student also had an exceptional
memory and was quite resourceful. Well, that's a
different story."

48.name: Eni-sensei
48.text:
"If Sol has learned and mastered those things
properly, I believe she can pass this exam without
any problems. You'll be fine, won't you?"

49.name: Sol
49.text:
"Y-Yes! I will definitely live up to Sensei's
expectations!! I'll do my best!"

50.name: Eni-sensei
50.text:
"Very well. Then, please transform back into your
dragon form and carry me."

51.name: Sol
51.text: "Huh? Sensei, are you coming with me too?"

52.name: Eni-sensei
52.text:
"Of course. Who do you think will be grading Sol's
exam?"

53.name: Eni-sensei
53.text:
"Besides, there may be some danger involved, so
just in case, I will accompany you. I'll only be
lending a hand, though."
